flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=22>>22 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 22 bags = <<48-22=26>>26 bags for $22 each
26 bags were sold for 26 bags x $22/bag = $<<26*22=572>>572
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $572 = $<<306+250+572=1128>>1128
The salesman made $1128 - $576 = $<<1128-576=552>>552 in profit.
#### 552

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 22. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
